successes.title: Dungeon Saga: The Dwarf King's Quest
successes.description: Dungeon Saga is a classic adventure board game where mighty heroes battle evil monsters in a tight and twisting fantasy dungeon!

Pledges.description: THANK YOU FOR BACKING! This reward level is perfect if you just want to pledge for add-ons and not the whole game. Pledges over $25 include free shipping to UK and US. Please see main page for international shipping.

Get the Dungeon Saga Boxed Game, Dungeon Saga Adventurer's Companion, and Kickstarter Exclusive Signed Art Print. You will also get Special Missions, Short Story and all 6 remastered Dwarf King's Hold: Dead Rising scenarios all contained in a Kickstarter Exclusive Dungeon Journal, PLUS Kickstarter Exclusive Keldan Aury’mtor hero figure and any applicable Stretch Goals! Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Get the Dungeon Saga Boxed Game, Dungeon Saga Adventurer's Companion, and Kickstarter Exclusive Signed Art Print. You will also get Special Missions, Short Story and all 6 remastered Dwarf King's Hold: Dead Rising scenarios all contained in a Kickstarter Exclusive Dungeon Journal, PLUS Kickstarter Exclusive Keldan Aury’mtor hero figure and any applicable Stretch Goals! Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.
